title: Massive Ping In game

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Hello! I'm having some serious ping issues on the NA server that just started about 48-60 hours ago. My ping usually hovers around 200 but it has popped up to a consistent 2,000+. The game is now completely unplayable. Other games don't seem to have this problem and pinging things in the area give me a 200 or so ping. I've attached screenshots of me pinging the League server @ 104.160.131.3 with a 200ms ping. I get 200 ping EVERY time I ping that IP. However, in game EVERY time I get a 2,000 ping. I have no idea what could be causing this issue. Any ideas?

replies.body: Big changes in latency are typically influenced by changes in your ISP routing to the servers. Before we take an in-depth look at your route, we need to ensure your local network settings are A-Okay. Work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if you still encounter high latency.

Thank you greatly for your response. One of my big issues is that I have absolutely zero access to my router settings. It is borrowed from my ISP and connecting through the default gateway IP simply returns no connection at all. I did what I could from the guide but it did not solve the problem. What would be the next step from here?

Running a traceroute during a time you experience these symptoms will give me an idea of what's going on along your route. You can complete this by grabbing [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) then plugging **104.160.131.1** into the host field, then starting the trace. After 5 minutes has gone by, export the results as text and paste them in a reply to me.

Let me know if you run into any issues with this.

I am in the same situation myself. I normally play around 20 or 30 ping though and my ping now makes it completely unplayable. If you figure anything out please let me know and Ill do the same for you
